thread.title: Kangana Ranaut is talented and wonderful: Amitabh Bachchan
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut is talented and wonderful: Amitabh Bachchan | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Kangana Ranaut is talented and wonderful: Amitabh Bachchan
text:
Other Articles Nick Gordon 'worthy of suspect status' over Bobbi Kristina Brown's death? Space shuttles: NASA drops secrecy, puts Challenger, Columbia wreckage on public display for first time Britney Spears' song 'Toxic' helps fan recover from brain aneurysm Megastar Amitabh Bachchan has praised “Tanu Weds Manu Returns” actress Kangana Ranaut , calling her “talented and wonderful”.
The 72-year-old actor, who will share screen space with Kangana in a Rajkumar Hirani-directed commercial, took to Twitter to share his excitement.
“At work at last with the wonder called Kangana Ranaut… She be so good… And talented and wonderful,” he wrote along side a picture of the duo.
The “Piku” star also praised “PK” director Hirani.
“And the other wonder Raju Hirani on set in making!”
Bachchan, who is seen sporting a fake full beard look for the advertisement, said even though sticking a beard is a “curse”, the final result makes it worth the effort.
“A curse for me when beards have to be stuck on… But the end results and the camera make it so believable.”
First Published on August 02, 2015 8:57 am
